author: Melissa Roberto
title: Courteney Cox calls for an end to illegal wildlife trade: It 'caused' coronavirus
description: Courteney Cox is urging citizens around the world to help put an end to illegal wildlife trade because she says it's what caused the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
